name: whiten
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to make or become whiter: She had her nicotine-stained teeth whitened. Her hair had whitened over the years.

whiten verb [I/T]
(COLOR)
Add to word list
Add to word list
to make something whiter, or to become whiter: [ T ] This toothpaste is supposed to whiten your teeth.
